entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
